::Shadow Wing::

She tried once again to activate the vocal cords to the form.  She 
managed one word to come out clearly, the rest was 
garbled. "Lunarpine....."   She tried again, but the connection 
wasn't clear.  She felt a little disappointed in herself.  She wanted 
so much to try to talk through this form, but it wasn't going to 
happen.  She reached up with the arm and touched Veratis. Through the 
connection to the eyes, she could see Veratis, but only as a fuzzy 
outline of a bot.  Not a clear visual picture. She touched his arm, 
but couldn't feel it.  She could see it a little, but still had no 
feeling.  This form was not her's yet.  It was a controlled form, but 
not connected to her.
